About

I am a PhD student (since 2016) in Computer Science at the University of Colorado Boulder. I work with my advisor Eric Keller in the Networking and Security Research Group (NSR). My research spans the areas of Software-defined Networking (SDN), Network Functions Virtualization (NFV), and distributed, cloud, and network systems in general. I interned at AT&T Labs Research during the summer of 2017, and have been working closely with them ever since.
